metadata.synopsis: Philomeen inside basement sees gnomes coming back from checkpoint scene and greets them surprised.

0.speaker: Hogi Nuners
0.text: Back so soon? Lemme guess: Steel Watchers.
0.context: NodeContext: Mildly surprised about the first part but definitely not the second (and clear distaste for said Steel Watchers))

1.speaker: Hogi Nuners
1.text: And you're not alone I see.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Player is following the 2 gnomes
